description: [Tox](https://github.com/irungentoo/ProjectTox-Core#why-are-you-doing-this-there-are-already-a-bunch-of-free-skype-alternatives)  The goal of this project is to create a configuration free p2p skype replacement.
ohloh_description:
Tox as is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool you can use for:

* checking your package installs correctly with different Python versions and interpreters

* running your tests in each of the environments, configuring your test tool of choice

* acting as a frontend to Continuous Integration servers, greatly reducing boilerplate and merging CI and shell-based testing.
name: Tox
